search.query: index=kafka sourcetype=kafka NOT Kafka-Mirror-Maker-Process-* | stats count by environment
index=kafka sourcetype=kafka domainName=cpu environment=$env$ NOT host=*mirror* | timechart latest(usedCpuPercent) as usedCpuPercent by host
index=kafka sourcetype=kafka domainName=memory environment=$env$ NOT host=*mirror* | timechart latest(totalMem) as TotalMemory, latest(usedMem) as UsedMemory, latest(buffers) as Buffers by host

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.server" queryName="type=BrokerTopicMetrics,name=MessagesInPerSec/OneMinuteRate" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=BrokerTopicMetrics,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f
index=kafka sourcetype=kafka domainName=disk environment=$env$ NOT host=*mirror* | timechart latest(usedInGB) as usedInGB, latest(totalInGB) as totalInGB by host

panel.title: Apache Kafka Network In/Out (OneMinRate in MB)

search.query: index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ queryName="type=BrokerTopicMetrics,name=BytesInPerSec/OneMinuteRate" OR queryName="type=BrokerTopicMetrics,name=BytesOutPerSec/OneMinuteRate" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=BrokerTopicMetrics,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | eval queryValue=queryValue/1000000 | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

panel.title: Size of Partitions (per topic & per partition count) (GB)

search.query: index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ queryName="type=Log,name=Size,topic=*,partition=*/Value" NOT queryName="type=Log,name=Size,topic=__*,partition=*/Value" AND queryValue > 1000000 | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=Log,name=Size,topic=") | eval topicNameWithPartition=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=topicNameWithPartition.":".host | eval queryValue=queryValue/1000000000 | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ queryName="type=KafkaController,name=*/Value" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=KafkaController,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.server" queryName="type=ReplicaManager,name=*/Value" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=ReplicaManager,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

panel.title: Kafka Zookeeper Connections Stats (1 Min Rate)

search.query: index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.server" queryName="type=SessionExpireListener,name=ZooKeeper*PerSec/OneMinuteRate" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=SessionExpireListener,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ queryName="type=BrokerTopicMetrics,name=*RequestsPerSec/OneMinuteRate" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=BrokerTopicMetrics,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.network" queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=TotalTimeMs,request=*/99thPercentile" OR queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=TotalTimeMs,request=*/50thPercentile" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=RequestMetrics,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.controller" queryName="type=ControllerStats,name=*/Mean" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=ControllerStats,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.network" queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=RemoteTimeMs,request=*/99thPercentile" OR queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=RemoteTimeMs,request=*/50thPercentile" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=RequestMetrics,name=RemoteTimeMs,request=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.network" queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=RequestQueueTimeMs,request=*/99thPercentile" OR queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=RequestQueueTimeMs,request=*/50thPercentile" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=RequestMetrics,name=RequestQueueTimeMs,request=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.network" queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=ResponseQueueTimeMs,request=*/99thPercentile" OR queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=ResponseQueueTimeMs,request=*/50thPercentile" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=RequestMetrics,name=ResponseQueueTimeMs,request=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.network" queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=ResponseSendTimeMs,request=*/99thPercentile" OR queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=ResponseSendTimeMs,request=*/50thPercentile" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=RequestMetrics,name=ResponseSendTimeMs,request=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.network" queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=LocalTimeMs,request=*/99thPercentile" OR queryName="type=RequestMetrics,name=LocalTimeMs,request=*/50thPercentile" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=RequestMetrics,name=LocalTimeMs,request=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ queryName="type=ReplicaFetcherManager,name=MaxLag,clientId=Replica/Value" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=ReplicaFetcherManager,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.log" queryName="type=LogFlushStats,name=LogFlushRateAndTimeMs/99thPercentile" OR queryName="type=LogFlushStats,name=LogFlushRateAndTimeMs/50thPercentile" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=LogFlushStats,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.server" queryName="type=DelayedOperationPurgatory*/Value" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=DelayedOperationPurgatory,name=PurgatorySize,delayedOperation=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.network" queryName="type=RequestChannel,name=RequestQueueSize*" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=RequestChannel,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ domainName="kafka.network" queryName="type=SocketServer,name=NetworkProcessorAvgIdlePercent*" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=SocketServer,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka NOT host=*mirror* environment=$env$ domainName="java.lang" queryName="type=Memory/*MemoryUsage/used" OR queryName="type=Memory/HeapMemoryUsage/max" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=Memory/") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | eval queryValue=queryValue/1000000000 | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka NOT host=*mirror* environment=$env$ domainName="java.lang" queryName="type=GarbageCollector,name=*CollectionCount" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=GarbageCollector,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka NOT host=*mirror* environment=$env$ domainName="java.lang" queryName="type=ClassLoading/*ClassCount" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=ClassLoading/") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f
